title: The Ghosts of the Cooper-Evans House
itunes:title: The Ghosts of the Cooper-Evans House
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
Some places should be left alone...

***

Written by William Falo and narrated by Megan McDuffee and Owen McCuen

***

Bonus episode: I Wasn't Always Claustrophobic, written by Polterkites and narrated by Steve Blizin

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Produced by Steve Blizin

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
